name: I spent 48 hours on a game jam and all I got was a single arrow
name_original: I spent 48 hours on a game jam and all I got was a single arrow
description:
This is a competitive multiplayer game made for the Game Maker's Toolkit jam 2019

REQUIRES A GAMEPAD FOR EACH PLAYER

Can be played with 2-4 people (or one really dexterous lonely person on multiple gamepads).

You only have one arrow
You have to hit the other players with it.
-Left stick to move
-Right stick to aim
-HOLD right trigger to charge your shot
-RELEASE right trigger to shoot
-Press left trigger while charging to cancel your shot
-Holding longer leads to a more powerful shot
-If you have no arrow, you have to pick one up to shoot again
-Press right trigger while you have no arrow to dodge quickly
-Players respawn when there's only one person left
-The first player to reach 5 kills wins!

Credits:

Programming, Design - Massimo Gauthier

Design, Art - Nathaniel Gibbs-Remenda

Design, Testing - Alex Laliberté-Mercier
